headline: Cloudflare Workers is now on Open Beta
keywords: Product News, Beta, Developers, Serverless, Cloudflare Workers, JavaScript
description:
Cloudflare Workers Beta is now open!

Cloudflare Workers lets you run JavaScript on Cloudflareâ€™s edge, deploying globally to over 120+ data centers around the world in less than 30 seconds. Your code can intercept and modify any request made to your website.
